member.name: T:GetCustomAttributeExtension
member.summary: Allows retrieving custom attributes from assemblies, types, methods, properties, etc. using a generic method.

member.name: M:GetCustomAttributeExtension.GetCustomAttribute``1(System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the first defined attribute of the given type from the provider if any.
member.typeparam: Type of the attribute, which must inherit from .
member.param: Any type implementing the interface, which can be an assembly, type, property, method, etc.
Optionally, whether the attribute will be looked in base classes.
member.returns: The attribute instance if defined; otherwise.

member.name: M:GetCustomAttributeExtension.GetCustomAttributes``1(System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the first defined attribute of the given type from the provider if any.
member.typeparam: Type of the attribute, which must inherit from .
member.param: Any type implementing the interface, which can be an assembly, type, property, method, etc.
Optionally, whether the attribute will be looked in base classes.
member.returns: The attribute instance if defined; otherwise.
